Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.GameController
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiPlayerController, SinglePlayerController
public abstract class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class GameController represents a generic game controller. It contains method that are equal in both SinglePlayerController and MultiPlayerController.

  • Method Details

    • reloadView

      public void reloadView​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Notifies a player's virtual view with a set of messages containing all the view elements. Used when a player is reconnecting to the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to notify

    • getServer

      Returns the server that is hosting the game.

    • setUpPlayer

      public void setUpPlayer​(ClientConnection connection)
      Creates a new Player object associated with a ClientConnection object and adds it to the list of players in the game, the list of active players and the list of active connections.
      Parameters:
      connection - the ClientConnection object associated with the player

    • checkAllPapalReports

      public void checkAllPapalReports()
      Checks if any papal report needs to be triggered. If one of them is triggered it updates the status of papal cards for all the players.

    • checkPapalReport

      private void checkPapalReport​(int vaticanReportTrigger, int vaticanReportStart, int cardStatusIndex)
      Checks if a specified papal report needs to be triggered. If the papal report is triggered it updates the status of the corresponding papal cards for all the players.
      Parameters:
      vaticanReportTrigger - the index of the cell on the itinerary triggering the report
      vaticanReportStart - the first cell on the itinerary that allows a player to turn is card up if the report is triggered
      cardStatusIndex - the index of the papal cards that needs to be updated

    • addItineraryVP

      protected int addItineraryVP​(Player player)
      Returns the amount of victory points given to a specified player for his position on the itinerary.
      Parameters:
      player - the specified player
      Returns:
      the amount of victory points given for the player's position on the itinerary

    • addPapalVP

      public int addPapalVP​(Player player)
      Returns the amount of victory points given to a specified player by his papal cards.
      Parameters:
      player - the specified player
      Returns:
      the amount of victory points given by the player's papal cards
